metadata.title: Logitech C920 vs C922 2025: Webcam Comparison
metadata.description: Compare Logitech C920 and C922 webcams. Features, image quality, and which is best for YouTube creators.

hero.headline: Logitech C920 vs C922: Which Webcam to Choose?
hero.subheadline: Two popular webcams, one big question. Here's the complete comparison.

sections.content: The Logitech C920 and C922 look nearly identical but have key differences. The C922 adds better low-light performance and background replacement for streaming. But is the price difference worth it? Here's a detailed comparison for YouTube creators and streamers.

content.title: Lower Price
content.description: $30 cheaper for nearly identical core specs. Great budget choice.

content.title: Proven Track Record
content.description: Years of reliable performance. The classic YouTube webcam.

content.title: Widely Available
content.description: Easy to find everywhere. Consistent availability.

content.title: Better Low Light
content.description: Improved sensor performance in dim conditions. Visible difference.

content.title: 720p/60fps Option
content.description: Smoother motion for streaming at 720p. Good for fast movement.

content.title: Background Replacement
content.description: Built-in green screen effect without actual green screen.

sections.title: Which Should You Choose?
content: Choose C920 if: Budget is priority
Choose C920 if: Good lighting in your space
Choose C920 if: Recording primarily (not streaming)
Choose C922 if: Low light is common
Choose C922 if: You stream live content
Choose C922 if: You want background replacement

faq.question: Is the C922 worth $30 more?
faq.answer: For streamers and low-light situations, yes. For well-lit recording, probably not. The core image quality is very similar.

faq.question: Should I just get a better camera?
faq.answer: If budget allows, dedicated cameras beat webcams. But for starting out or face cams, both Logitechs are solid choices.

faq.question: Do the built-in mics work well?
faq.answer: Acceptable for basic use. Dedicated microphones sound much better. Use the webcam mic as backup only.

faq.question: Is the background replacement any good?
faq.answer: Works okay with good lighting. Not as clean as actual green screen. Useful in a pinch but has visible edges.
